title: When the enemy top laner bans your main so you try hard to make them mad.
body:
http://i.imgur.com/zKywgUo.gif?noredirect


That poor riven didn't have a chance.

replies.body: Ahahah you banned ryze? Ima stick my nasus cane up your ass
That's funny.  I do the same exact thing when they ban my Garen.

When darius is banned?
Gangplank.
Then they bore them self to death in lane and i just carry like:
Ban my darius?Sure,1 keg and rip your team.

They banned my Morde.

So i took the D man top.

and flexed all over the puny Riven
http://45.media.tumblr.com/bbf24b77beb1312853912af8b396e6b0/tumblr_nncwnpWoV61tifi3io3_500.gif

I don't play morde on ranked,but mostly normals.
But when i do,i 1v3 the enemy.
do you mean 2v2 because the other one dies

No one bans Jayce anyway. 

http://img14.deviantart.net/556f/i/2014/019/e/e/mr__jayce_gatsby_by_fiveonthe-d72rg34.jpg

Cheers old sport
ok that art is amazing
(Its a reference to _The Great Gatsby_, which is a classic)
i know, thats why its amazing, its well done but its the perfect reference.
You take my main, I take your game

I get banned out way too often when I try to test out new builds, a while ago I just picked top lane Nunu as a result just to make sure that the person who banned my champ did not get to play league of legends that game.
Who is getting banned out a lot?

It's not even with the same champ, like with the new champ select I might want to try a specific champ out mid but end up in a lobby several times in a row as a different role, this particular game was one where I wanted to try something out on top lane Quinn, and had already gone through 2 games where I got mid instead of top, took me 5 games before I actually got to try out the build I wanted. A similar thing happened the other day when I wanted to try out Taliyah mid and before that when I was trying to get level 7 on Sona, the top laner on my team locked her in to troll me. With team builder I could just pick a champ and a role and I got it every time, so I could actually practice something specific without needing the RNG to line up.

Alright, we're going to have a nice time playing some Taric top and...
(Summoner 4 has banned Taric)
{{champion:86}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3009}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3156}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3147}} {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:4}} 
ALRIGHT YOU SORRY SACKS OF VILLAINY, WHICHEVER ONE OF YOU BANNED TARIC IS ABOUT TO REGRET DOING THAT

Can I ask for the match history of that riven?

I want to see the suffering.
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2199838480/43827673?tab=overview

{{champion:117}} / {{champion:25}} {{summoner:12}} {{summoner:4}}

You wanted to have fun in top lane?
Banned the Dragon?{{champion:102}}  That's cool, I just take the Dragon Enslaver {{champion:82}}
The one game I wanted to play riven.. just because I have the arcade skin... they first pic riven... Top lane taric before the rework.. oh the rage and salty tears.. they tasted.. truly outrageous ;)

whenever someone tries to ban me out I just go into 
http://66.media.tumblr.com/0712ec0780600c98dc67fc0390996cb3/tumblr_inline_nzadkkFDZT1rxihkn_500.gif
It's funny since {{champion:3}} is never banned, but i guess i would make their lives miserable by playing heim if it ever did happen.
Still gonna suck up your elo and kda through a bendy straw if you ban jhin.
But then you realize that they forgot to ban Kekko and the enemy top laner smashes their head through their computer.
